Notes.title: Crew Death
Notes.0: Unfortunately, a crew member has died.
Notes.1: Go into 'crew view' to see who.
Notes.2: You must be a terrible captain.

Notes.title: Success
Notes.0: Congratulations. You have traversed the asteroids
Notes.1: unscathed. Your crew is alive and the ship is in tact.

Notes.title: Failure
Notes.0: An asteroid broke a hole in the side of the ship.
Notes.1: Before the airlock could close, a crew member was sucked
Notes.2: into space. Check 'crew view' to see who you lost

Notes.title: The Long Way
Notes.0: You take your crew far off course in order to avoid the
Notes.1: asteroid field. You make it safely, but at the cost of
Notes.2: food rations and morale due to a longer trip.

Notes.title: Success
Notes.0: You managed to equally split the rations among your members.
Notes.1: Everyone is full and satisfied.

Notes.title: Failure
Notes.0: You are either blind or incapable of using a knife.
Notes.1: Some crew member left this meal hungry.

Notes.title: OMNOMNOMNOM
Notes.0: That was tasty.
Notes.1: Your crew is hungry and has lowered morale.

Notes.title: Fight
Notes.0: Turns out ships are not a great place for fighting.
Notes.1: A crew member was thrown across the ship towards a pointy
Notes.2: thing. Zero gravity didn't let him stop himself, so he was
Notes.3: slowly impaled. Use 'crew view' to see who died.

Notes.title: Success
Notes.0: You managed to kill the mouse. Your rations are safe.

Notes.title: Failure
Notes.0: You have embarrassed yourself with your inability to handle
Notes.1: a simple mouse. Your crew morale has dropped.

Notes.title: New Crew Member
Notes.0: You managed to befriend the mouse, or so you thought.
Notes.1: The little bugger bit you when you tried to pick it up.

Notes.title: Mouse Trapped?
Notes.0: The engineer'i trap malfunctioned and killed the mouse
Notes.1: instead of capturing it. Sadness.

Notes.title: All Hail Skynet
Notes.0: After getting on your knees and praising the computer,
Notes.1: it rerouted your ship and got you to Mars in record time.
Notes.2: It turns out it never needed you after all. You feel like

Notes.title: <thump>
Notes.0: After a quick punch the system resets and all is well...
Notes.1: or so you thought
Notes.2: The AI was prepared: the ship immediately self destructs
Notes.3: killing all inside. Learn to code next time.

Notes.title: Insert Hollywood Code Montage
Notes.0: Your super skilled amazing programmer dude plugged his
Notes.1: laptop in and after a few clicks and wizardry that there
Notes.2: is no time to explain, the AI is gone and the ship is back

Notes.title: Hangry Crewmates
Notes.0: In a blaze of hangry furry, your crew members begin
Notes.1: to brawl. The fight leaves them even hungrier and
Notes.2: with a newfound distrust among members. Morale dips.

Notes.title: Bye Ken
Notes.0: You point to Ken, because he's Ken. The crew grabs him
Notes.1: and throws him out the airlock. Ahh Ken.
Notes.2: You didn't have a crew member named Ken? He was undercover.

Notes.title: Bragadocious
Notes.0: You remind them that you are a perfect individual.
Notes.1: They look up and begin to smile. They had forgotten
Notes.2: about how glorious there leader was. Morale increased

Notes.title: Not So Hyped
Notes.0: As you begin to discuss Mars and the spectacle of your
Notes.1: endeavour the crew eyes roll. They miss home and no
Notes.2: longer care about the romantic Mars colonization that
Notes.3: they once fantasized about. Morale decreased.

Notes.title: Comedy Gold
Notes.0: Elon Musk wants to send people to mars...
Notes.1: I think we can all agree that he is the most creative
Notes.3: The crew laughs and morale improves.

Notes.title: Musical Genious
Notes.0: The musician grabs his guitar and plays a couple
Notes.1: Greta Van Fleet songs because they are the best band.
Notes.2: The crew loves it and morale is improved.
